title: Southern Charm Trailer + RHOP Monique v Candiace Recap with Raven Chatman (@MainlyBravo)!
itunes:title: Southern Charm Trailer + RHOP Monique v Candiace Recap with Raven Chatman (@MainlyBravo)!
itunes:subtitle: Danny recaps the season 7 trailer for Southern Charm, then welcomes Raven Chatman (@MainlyBravo) to recap this week's explosive Real Housewives of Potomac, which featured the Monique and Candiace incident, Karen and Ray seeing a DJ for marriage ad...
description:
Danny recaps the season 7 trailer for Southern Charm, then welcomes Raven Chatman (@MainlyBravo) to recap this week's explosive Real Housewives of Potomac, which featured the Monique and Candiace incident, Karen and Ray seeing a DJ for marriage advice, and a hot mic moment with Gizelle's dad!


RHOP Recap: 17:45ish


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
